CustomField.description: If selected DRE will automatically process records in separate batches. Doing so can increase system robustness at the cost of losing real-time feedback. Enable this setting if your organization contains complex automation processes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected DRE will automatically process records in separate batches. Doing so can increase system robustness at the cost of losing real-time feedback. Enable this setting if your organization contains complex automation processes
CustomField.label: Enable Auto-Bulk
